text: George Ronald Widby (March 9, 1945 â€“ December 23, 2020) was an American football punter in the National Football League (NFL) for the Dallas Cowboys and Green Bay Packers. Widby was born in Knoxville, Tennessee. Widby won the Super Bowl in 1972. Widby died on December 23, 2020 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football punters Category:American basketball players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Sportspeople from Knoxville, Tennessee
title: Ron Widby
